headline: Deploying Workers with GitHub Actions + Serverless
keywords: GitHub, Developers, Cloudflare Workers, Serverless, JavaScript, Programming
description:
If you werenâ€™t aware, Cloudware Workers, our serverless programming platform, allows you to deploy code onto our 165 data centers around the world. 
Want to automatically deploy Workers directly from a GitHub repository? Now you can with our official GitHub Action.
